skill.name: information-security-manager-iso27001

Provides ISMS implementation, cybersecurity risk assessment, security controls management, and compliance oversight. Use for ISMS design, security risk assessments, control implementation, and ISO 27001 certification activities.

security_audit.summary: Prompt-only skill with no executable code. The SKILL.md defines a security expertise persona using markdown documentation. The scripts/ directory contains only a benign placeholder script that prints a message. No network calls, file operations, environment access, or external command execution capabilities were found.

content.value_statement: Organizations need expert guidance to implement ISO 27001 Information Security Management Systems and achieve compliance. This skill provides comprehensive frameworks for risk assessment, security controls, and regulatory compliance in healthcare and enterprise environments.
actual_capabilities: Design and implement ISO 27001 ISMS frameworks aligned with 2022 standards
Conduct cybersecurity risk assessments with threat identification and treatment planning
Implement ISO 27002 security controls across organizational, people, physical, and technological domains
Manage healthcare-specific security requirements including HIPAA and medical device cybersecurity
Develop security policies, awareness programs, and incident management processes
Prepare for ISO 27001 certification audits and regulatory compliance assessments
limitations: Does not execute actual security scans or penetration tests on user systems
Cannot access external APIs or third-party compliance services
Does not modify user files or system configurations
Cannot provide legal advice or bind users to regulatory obligations

use_cases.title: HIPAA and Medical Device Security
use_cases.description: Implement FDA-compliant medical device cybersecurity and protect clinical trial data with healthcare-specific security controls.

use_cases.title: ISO 27001 Certification Prep
use_cases.description: Prepare for certification audits with gap analysis, risk assessment frameworks, and documentation templates.

use_cases.title: Security Control Implementation
use_cases.description: Deploy comprehensive security controls using ISO 27002 guidelines for access control, cryptography, and network security.

prompt_templates.title: ISMS Kickoff
prompt_templates.scenario: Starting a new information security management system
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me design an ISO 27001 ISMS implementation plan. Include scope definition, risk assessment methodology, and key milestones for a healthcare technology organization.

prompt_templates.title: Risk Assessment
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a comprehensive security risk assessment framework for identifying threats, evaluating vulnerabilities, and prioritizing risk treatment for cloud-based healthcare systems.

prompt_templates.title: Control Selection
prompt_templates.prompt: Map ISO 27002 controls to our medical device cybersecurity requirements. Include technical safeguards, access controls, and incident response procedures.

prompt_templates.title: Audit Preparation
prompt_templates.prompt: Develop an internal audit checklist for ISO 27001 compliance. Include evidence requirements for organizational controls, human resource security, and physical security domains.

best_practices: Start with a clearly defined scope that includes all information assets and processing systems
Align risk assessment methodology with ISO 27001 Clause 6.1.2 requirements for documentation
Integrate ISO 27002 controls with existing healthcare compliance frameworks (HIPAA, FDA guidance)
anti_patterns: Implementing controls without first completing a formal risk assessment
Treating ISO 27001 certification as a one-time event instead of continuous improvement
Neglecting to involve senior management in security governance and policy approval

faq.question: What AI tools is this skill compatible with?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude Code for agent workflows and standard Claude for chat-based security guidance.

faq.question: What is the difference between ISO 27001 and ISO 27002?
faq.answer: ISO 27001 defines ISMS requirements and certification criteria. ISO 27002 provides implementation guidance for security controls.

faq.question: Can this skill help with HIPAA compliance in healthcare?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill includes healthcare-specific guidance for HIPAA technical safeguards and FDA medical device cybersecurity requirements.

faq.question: Does this skill modify my files or systems?
faq.answer: No. This is a prompt-only skill that provides guidance and frameworks. It does not execute code or modify any files.

faq.question: How long does ISO 27001 certification typically take?
faq.answer: Timeline varies by organization size and maturity. Most organizations need 6-18 months from kickoff to Stage 1 audit readiness.

faq.question: What is the difference between this skill and hiring a consultant?
faq.answer: This skill provides frameworks and guidance for teams to implement controls themselves. Consultants provide audit services and formal attestations.
